html: "If we don't uphold the role of the legislative branch, the checks and balances will be gone," Rep. @GerryConnolly says.
text: "If we don't uphold the role of the legislative branch, the checks and balances will be gone," Rep. @GerryConnolly says.

html: "It is unprecedented. You are now having the two branches directly in conflict about their respective roles as delineated by the Constitution of the United States," Rep. @GerryConnolly says.
text: "It is unprecedented. You are now having the two branches directly in conflict about their respective roles as delineated by the Constitution of the United States," Rep. @GerryConnolly says.

html: "For the president to dismiss it all as political is to dismiss the constitutional framework," Rep. @GerryConnolly says of the subpoenas. He says Congress has a "constitutional role" to play.

Two years ago House Republicans began the 115th Congress by reviving an old rule which would allow them to attack federal workers in must-pass legislation.

text: The IG estimates that the Funding Gap Analysis GSA provided to Congress for its revised plan to rebuild on the Hoover site underestimated the cost of that option by as much as $516 million – nearly a quarter of the original shortfall estimate.https://connolly.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=1453 …

html: The report also finds that “GSA did not include all of the costs in its Revised FBI Headquarters Plan, and that the new demolish and rebuild plan would cost more than the cancelled exchange plan.”

html: Salem Witch Judge is the bio of Samuel Sewall who had 20 individuals hanged for witchcraft in 17th c. Salem, Mass. Author Eve LaPlante, a descendant, attempts to make the case for his repentance but never documents a shred of doubt during the witchcraft hysteria.
text:
Salem Witch Judge is the bio of Samuel Sewall who had 20 individuals hanged for witchcraft in 17th c. Salem, Mass. Author Eve     
LaPlante, a descendant, attempts to make the case for his repentance but never documents a shred of doubt during the witchcraft hysteria.

Today, I joined @RepCummings in asking Chairman Gowdy to issue a subpoena to obtain documents that are currently being withheld.https://www.washingtonpost.com/national/health-science/pruitt-had-aide-do-numerous-personal-tasks-including-a-hunt-for-a-used-trump-hotel-mattress/2018/06/04/a1f72c84-6043-11e8-b2b8-08a538d9dbd6_story.html?utm_term=.252a96530ae4 …

html: Joined @WolfBlitzer to discuss the Trump Summit with North Korea being back on. I want to wish for the very best, but everything we have seen has been PR. We are no longer seeking speedy denuclearization, it seems we are now seeking a get to know you session.pic.twitter.com/cmDG1hq2HE
text: Joined @WolfBlitzer to discuss the Trump Summit with North Korea being back on. I want to wish for the very best, but everything we have seen has been PR. We are no longer seeking speedy denuclearization, it seems we are now seeking a get to know you session.pic.twitter.com/cmDG1hq2HE

html: Will be joining @wolfblitzer @CNNSitRoom at 6PM to talk about the Summit with Kim Jong Un being back on.

html: One year ago today, POTUS announced he would withdraw from the Paris Climate deal, an agreement we led and every other country in the world supports. That makes America retreat again.
